name: Bucquistador
overview:
www.Bucquistador.com is a social networking site centered on interactive bucket lists. Users are able to create a bucket list, invite friends to participate in the completion of a bucket item, schedule an event, and even raise funds to complete a life’s goal. The site provides users with a sense of community while striving to break down barriers that prevent many individuals from completing the items on their bucket list.

Privacy settings allow users to create personal goals, invite friends to complete an activity with them, or open an event up to their local community to find new friends with the same interests. Users can leave comments, photos, and videos touting accomplishments, or encouraging others to fulfill their dreams. If funding is a problem for someone we have them covered; the site allows users to request funds from friends and family.
